room_title: Escape room "Murder Mystery on Baker Street" by Escape on Main in St. Louis
review: We had family visiting for Christmas so my wife and I scheduled an Escape On Main Baker Street Mystery. We had my wife and I, my brother and his wife and their two twenty-somethings. Before starting, we were told that every successful group had requested at least two clues. There are some leaps of logic that absolutely require a clue so do not hesitate to ask for a few clues! We escaped with 20 seconds to spare and it was great fun!

room_title: Escape room "Murder Mystery on Baker Street" by Escape on Main in St. Louis
review: This puzzle was great. We did the Baker Street Mystery and it was a blast. Tons to do. We were a team of 4, and I feel that was ideal. I think 8 would be way to much, so I would recommend buying the room out. Wish we were in the area longer to do the casino one.

room_title: Escape room "Murder Mystery on Baker Street" by Escape on Main in St. Louis
review: Baker Street Mystery Room was terrific fun.  We had a great time.  Clever puzzles, great space,  awesome location, and the owner, Ryan was very friendly and accommodating.
